references.paper_title: Comprehensive molecular portraits of human breast tumours
references.reason: This paper provides the data from the TCGA-BRCA dataset used in this study.

references.paper_title: Data-efficient and weakly supervised computational pathology on whole-slide images.
references.reason: This paper utilizes a UNI encoder for feature extraction as mentioned in Section 3.1.

references.paper_title: Deep high-resolution representation learning for visual recognition.
references.reason: This paper discusses HRNet which is related to the high resolution representations used in PathoHR.

references.paper_title: Token merging for memory-efficient vision transformers.
references.reason: This paper provides the technique for token merging that is used to reduce computational resource usage and maintain model performance by applying a token merging strategy.

references.paper_title: Vitar: Vision transformer with any resolution.
references.reason: This paper proposes Adaptive Token Merge and Fuzzy Positional Encodings, which are the two parts of the plug-in-play ViTAR encoder.
